Message:
a really scary dream
where Big Sis wasn’t
here anymore.

When I frantically
opened my eyes,
I saw Big Sis smiling at me.

Thank goodness.
It really was all just a dream.

But when I went to
nuzzle up to Big Sis,
N-No, it’s not what it looks like...

but this strange power
poured outta me, and...

Before I knew it,
I was all alone in my dream.
